result.reason: Middle-click close handler targets the wrong object (likely the panel container rather than the specific clicked tab), causing all panels to close instead of just the one that was middle-clicked.
result.approach: Find the MouseDown/MouseUp handler for middle-click (MouseButtons.Middle) on the tab strip, identify the tab under the cursor using GetTabAt(e.Location) or similar hit-testing, and call Close() only on that specific tab/panel rather than iterating all panels or calling a global close method.
